Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with narrow mouth, short bottleneck and unstable base with convex bottom. Paste of an orangey colour and surface with reddish-coloured coating, partially lost. The upper third presents a painted decoration in two colours, formed by four parallel horizontal lines in dark red which encircle the piece, demarcated by three bands with circles in dark red (upper and lower) and orangey colours (middle).
